full_text: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @pbso.org To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Re: EPSTEIN #76318-054 Sent: Fri, 23 Aug 2019 20:16:40 +0000 I was in court all week I'll reach out to you early next week and see what I can assistance I can provide. Again sorry in the delay have a good weekend. (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Sent from my iPad On Aug 21, 2019, at 3:17 PM, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov wrote: **This email was sent from an external (non-PBSO) source.** Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(A), (b)(7)(C), (b)(7)(E) Please feel free to contact me at 646-836 (b)(6) to discuss, and thank you for your cooperation. Best, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836(b)(6) f: 646-836-7665
